contentrichtext.text: The following is a categorized '''list of [[Test method|tests]]''' covered in Wikipedia: == Medical tests == * [[Apgar test]] * [[Biopsy]] * [[Blood test]] * [[DNA test]] * [[Gait Abnormality Rating Scale]] * [[Glucose Tolerance Test]] * [[Ishihara colour test]] * [[Liver function test]] * [[Lumbar puncture]] * [[Mantoux test]] * [[Oral glucose tolerance test]] * [[Pap smear]] * [[Parental testing|Parental test]] * [[RAST test]] (radioallergosorbent test) * [[Urea Breath Test]] * [[Wassermann test]] for [[syphilis]] == Intelligence tests == * [[Cattell Culture Fair]] * [[Kohs block]] * [[Leiter International Performance Scale]] * [[Miller Analogies Test]] * [[Otis-Lennon School Ability Test]] * [[Raven's Progressive Matrices]] * [[Stanford-Binet IQ test]] * [[Triarchic theory of intelligence|Sternberg Triarchic Abilities Test]] * [[Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale]] * [[Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children]] * [[Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence]] * [[Wonderlic Test]] == Cognitive development tests == * [[Draw-A-Person Test]] * [[Knox Cubes]] * [[Modern Language Aptitude Test]] * [[Multiple choice]] * [[Pimsleur Language Aptitude Battery]] * [[Porteus Maze Test]] == Self tests == * [[Mirror test]] * [[Sally-Anne test]] (the ability to attribute false beliefs to others) == Personality tests == * [[Activity vector analysis|Activity vector analysis (AVA)]] * [[Bem Sex Role Inventory]] * [[California Psychological Inventory]] * [[Eysenck Personality Questionnaire]] * [[Hare Psychopathy Checklist]] * [[Herrmann Brain Dominance Instrument]] (HBDI) * [[Holland Codes]] (RIASEC) * [[Keirsey Temperament Sorter]] * [[Minnesota Multiphasic Personality Inventory]] (MMPI) * [[Millon Clinical Multiaxial Inventory]] (MCMI) * [[Myers-Briggs Type Indicator]] (MBTI) * [[Revised NEO Personality Inventory]] * [[Robin Hood Morality Test]] * [[Rorschach inkblot test]] * [[16PF|Sixteen Personality Factor Questionnaire or 16PF Questionnaire]] (16PF) * [[Taylor-Johnson Temperament Analysis]] * [[Temperament and Character Inventory]] * [[Thematic Apperception Test]] == Clinical Psychology tests == * [[Beck Depression Inventory]] * [[DASS (psychology)]] == Statistical tests == * [[Ames test]] * [[Chi-squared test]] * [[Draize test]] * [[F-test]] * [[Kolmogorovâ€“Smirnov test]] * [[Kuiper's test]] * [[Likelihood-ratio test]] * [[Median test]] * [[Pearson's chi-squared test]] * [[Rank product]] test * [[Statistical hypothesis testing]] * [[Student's t-test]] * [[Tukey's range test]] * [[Tukey's test of additivity]] == Laboratory (non-medical) tests == * [[Marsh test]] * [[Parental testing|Paternity test]] * [[Radiocarbon dating]] == Pure-mathematical tests == * [[Fermat primality test]] * [[Miller-Rabin primality test]] * [[Primality test]] == Skills assessment tests == * [[Test (student assessment)|Student assessment test]] ** [[Scantron]] test * [[Bourdon-Wiersma test]] * [[Graduate Management Admission Test]] * [[Graduate Record Examination]] (GRE) * [[GRE Physics Test]] * [[Japanese Language Proficiency Test]] * [[Medical College Admission Test]] * [[SAT college entrance test]] * [[Screen test]] == Language tests == * [[IELTS]] (International English Language Testing System) * [[International Test of English Proficiency|iTEP]] (International Test of English Proficiency) * [[Teaching English as a Foreign Language|TEFL]] (Teaching English as a Foreign Language) * [[TOEFL]] (Test of English as a Foreign Language) * [[TOEIC]] (Test of English for International Communication) * [[TSE (examination)|TSE]] (Test of Spoken English) == Industrial and manufacturing tests == {{Portal|Software Testing}} * [[Acceptance test]] * [[Crash test]] * [[Moose test]] * [[Nondestructive testing]] (NDT/NDA) * [[Sanity test]] * [[Smoke test]] * [[Software testing]] * [[Stress testing|Stress test]] * [[Torture test]] * [[Unit test]] == Legal tests == {{Main|Legal tests}} == Miscellaneous and uncategorized tests == * [[Purity test]] * [[Nuclear testing]], [[Trinity site]] nuclear test * [[Wug test]] ([[linguistics]]) [[Category:Tests|List]] [[Category:Lists of lists|Tests]]
